title: NASA Expands Small Business, Industry Engagement Resources
summary: Two new resources are available for businesses that provide products and services to support NASA’s missions, from supersonic flight to lunar exploration, as well as companies that aim to engage the agency as a customer. While NASA practices transparency in its procurement processes to ensure access and participation by all businesses, we recognize that barriers […]

title: NASA’s cancellation of VIPER cedes leadership in lunar exploration
summary: Two months ago, NASA cancelled VIPER, a science rover mission to the Moon’s south pole to explore for water ice. This decision was made despite the fact that the rover […]

title: Soyuz brings two cosmonauts, NASA astronaut back to Earth after record-setting mission
U.S. eyes geostationary orbit for next-gen GPS
summary: The NTS-3 navigation satellite was delivered in early 2023 but Vulcan rocket delays have kept it on the ground

title: Find Exoasteroids and Peek into the Future
summary: What will remain of our solar system a few billion years from now?  We’re launching the Exoasteroids project to gather some clues. Join this new citizen science project, and help search for variable white dwarfs – bizarre objects that we can catch in the act of disassembling planetary systems. White dwarfs each pack the mass […]

title: NASA Astronaut Tracy C. Dyson, Crewmates Return from Space Station
summary: NASA astronaut Tracy C. Dyson completed a six-month research mission aboard the International Space Station on Monday, returning to Earth with Roscosmos cosmonauts Oleg Kononenko and Nikolai Chub. The trio departed the space station aboard the Soyuz MS-25 spacecraft at 4:36 a.m. EDT Monday, Sept. 23, making a safe, parachute-assisted landing at 7:59 a.m. (4:59 p.m. […]

title: Hera planetary defence mission: solving asteroid mysteries
summary: There’s a mystery out there in deep space – and solving it will make Earth safer. That’s why the European Space Agency’s Hera mission is taking shape – to go where one particular spacecraft has gone before.

title: A Chinese rocket narrowly missed a landing on Sunday—the video is amazing
